name: Ricardo: THE EXPERT
description:
Ricardo has gained all the experience and returns from the forest, now he runs over the city trying to find his home he has forgotten. Run, Platform, Explore and Fight your way through the vast cityscapes of Smiling Sun City.  Will you find your way back to the things you hold dear, or will you be overwelmed by the vastness of the big city that never sleeps. Find out now, in Ricardo: The Expert. By De Heren Games.
